name: Miami Beach Curls- 100% Unprocessed
description:
Our Peruvian hair comes from various regions of Peru, textures can range from soft waves, loose waves to slight waves. Our Peruvian hair matches African American textures as well as Latina and Armenian textures. Hair can be flat ironed or curled and made to look curly. Because hair is of virgin quality, can be dyed or bleached. 

Each Bundle: 3.5 ounce bundles / 100 grams *
Machine Wefted
All hair is 100% Human Hair imported from Peru
Hair can be colored and styled as desired

BUY TWO BUNDLES, GET ONE FREE! 

SHIPPING: 3-5 Business Days 

*Picture shows 24-26 Inches of our Miami Beach Curls*
